about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters.
Embark on Cody’s wild journey as a gay college student.
Cody joins Jax on a hot date as a safety precaution. Steve turns out to be quite the charmer and seduces both college boys into some dirty restroom fun.

GAME DESCRIPTION

EPISODE 2
Jax has a hot date tonight and asks Cody to be his wingman as a safety precaution. The guy he met online seems nice and all, but still… you never know who's hiding behind the screens these days. Fortunately, Cody doesn't have any plans and cannot resist a chance to have some fun. He dons something sexy and accompanies Jax to the college bar owned by his date, just outside campus.
To everyone’s surprise, Steve proves to be quite charming, and as the night unfolds, he positively seduces both of them.

Will Cody settle for playing bodyguard for Jax, or will he want his fair share of fun?
Follow the story and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains gay sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
